subject: Order with no follow up
description_text:
Hi, 

I made an order last week and have had no confirmation of the order being placed or any shipping information. Can you please help? 

Thanks,
Chris Lenton.

Director
Thames Flame
Tel: 07540427315
Tel: 020 3189 1414
www.thamesflame.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Chris Lenton,    Please provide your order number and we shall look into it for you.

Sorry, like I say I have not been sent an order number all I have is the transaction number from the payment that was made … Thanks, Chris Lenton. Director Thames Flame Tel: 07540427315 Tel: 020 3189 1414 www.thamesflame.com

Hi Chris Lenton,    This is the email address you provided: info@thamesflame.com.   Order confirmations and shipping notifications were sent to this address. We have updated it to your current email address. Here is your tracking link.    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047135866095
Ha, whoops, that’s gone to my office ?. Sorry about that thanks very much. Thanks, Chris Lenton. Director Thames Flame Tel: 07540427315 Tel: 020 3189 1414 www.thamesflame.com
